title: Obsidian Horseshoe
summaries: The Obsidian Horseshoe is an accessory that combines the functionality of the Lucky Horseshoe and the Obsidian Skull. It grants immunity to the burning damage inflicted by meteorite and hellstone blocks, while granting immunity to fall damage. However, it does not provide the extra 1 point of defense that the Obsidian Skull does.

statistics.Tooltip:
Negates fall damage
Grants immunity to fire blocks
statistics.Sell: 120
